name: Web of trust (WOT) color strip in urlbar
description: The WOT (Web of trust) color appears in the urlbar (Green, Yellowgreen, Yellow, Orange or Red) as a strip in the corner. By default, no score is grey. Tested on FF24, FF25 and FF26 NOTE : Another style includes security level: Security and WOT display enhancement (https://userstyles.org/styles/107740/security-and-wot-display-enhancement)
